entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: self-classification into religious and non-religious groups; religious people: the extent of accepting transcendence; indicators of religious life, opinion about non-religious people; non-religious people: opinion about religion, religious people and the future of religion; the total sample: sociological variables (hard variables); value preference, presence in social life/communities
